pages.text: Magic Infused Bees are essential creatures for any botanical mage. These special bees gather magical pollen from flowering plants and convert it into powerful spell essences.$(br2)Unlike ordinary bees, Magic Infused Bees can sense magical flowers from greater distances and are naturally drawn to them.

When a Magic Infused Bee visits a magical flower in bloom, it collects specialized pollen unique to that flower type. The bee will then return to a Magic Hive to deposit its gathered essence.$(br2)Each type of magical flower produces a different spell essence, which can be used in various magical crafting recipes.
The Magic Hive stores spell essences produced by your bees. It has 20 inventory slots and can be accessed by right-clicking. Hoppers and other automation can extract essences from all sides.

pages.title: Magical Flowers
pages.text: There are five types of magical flowers that produce unique essences:$(li)Flame Flowers - Fire magic$(li)Blink Flowers - Teleportation magic$(li)Rootgrasp Flowers - Earth magic$(li)Gust Flowers - Wind magic$(li)Breezevine Flowers - Levitation magic

pages.title: Bee Behavior
pages.text: Magic Infused Bees have several unique traits:$(li)They can detect magical flowers up to 16 blocks away$(li)They take less damage from non-magical attacks$(li)They emit magical particles while flying$(li)They can fly more effectively than normal bees
